channel.title: mint - Markets
channel.description: Get the latest news and analysis on business, finance, politics from mint, the website of the Mint newspaper, one of India's leading business and financial dailies

item.title: Analysts list out factors that will dictate stock markets trajectory this week
item.description: Market participants would also monitor the movement of Brent crude, investment pattern of foreign institutional investors and the rupee
item.author: Livemint

item.title: FPIs turn net buyers in June; invest ₹12,714 crore in Indian markets
item.description: Prior to this, overseas investors had pulled out ₹2,666 crore in May and ₹9,435 crore in April

item.title: Strategists flag near-term risks for Bitcoin price outlook
item.description: Bitcoin has roughly halved from a peak near $65,000 in April, hurt by a cryptocurrency clampdown in China

item.title: KIMS, Dodla Dairy shares to get listed on BSE, NSE tomorrow
item.description: KIMS is one of the largest corporate healthcare groups in Andhra Pradesh and Telangana and Dodla Dairy's operations in India are primarily across the four south Indian states of Andhra Pradesh, Telangana, Karnataka and Tamil Nadu
item.author: Livemint

item.title: Six of the top-10 firms add over ₹1.11 lakh crore in m-cap; TCS, Infosys top gainers
item.description: In contrast, Reliance Industries' market capitalisation declined by ₹76,548.77 crore to ₹13,34,009.02 crore

item.title: Elon Musk takes a jab at Bitcoin 'maxis'; they send stern responses
item.description: Bitcoin maximalists, or Bitcoin maxis, were not happy with Musk's latest jibe, and some called him out for his tweets on the cryptocurrency
item.author: Livemint

item.title: Bitcoin slips toward $30,000 as strategists flag near-term risks
item.description: Bitcoin has halved from a peak near $65,000 in April, hurt by a cryptocurrency clampdown in China, tightening regulatory scrutiny elsewhere and concerns that the servers underpinning the virtual coin consume too much energy

item.title: Is Paraguay set to make bitcoin legal tender? Don't bet on it
item.description: El Salvador's President Nayib Bukele said on Thursday that a recently passed law making a bitcoin legal tender will take effect on Sept. 7, making the Central American nation the first country in the world to take such a step.

item.title: Fed officials are starting to explain how Fedcoin might work
item.description: Central bank’s financial regulation chief Randal Quarles is scheduled to discuss the long-term digital currency project on Monday

item.title: S&P 500 ends at record to conclude winning week for US stocks
item.description: The broad-based index ended at 4,280.70, up 0.3 percent and a second straight record. The index added 2.7 percent for the week

item.title: Oil set for weekly gain as focus turns to upcoming OPEC+ meeting
item.description: Futures in New York rose as much as 1.2% and are on track to increase more than 3% this week, for the fifth straight weekly advance.Global benchmark Brent is at the highest level since October 2018

item.title: Wall Street update: Nike, bank stocks push S&P 500 to record high
item.description: Nike Inc surged 14.6% to an all-time high after the sneaker maker forecast fiscal full-year sales ahead of Wall Street estimates, helping the Dow rise 0.63%

item.title: Six most highly priced stocks to own in india
item.description: Here’s a list of companies with the highest share price in India.
item.author: Equitymaster

item.title: Marvel Entertainment to offer NFT collectibles via VeVe platform
item.description: Individuals will be able to purchase and interact with official Marvel NFT digital collectibles, 3D statues, and digital comic books through mixed reality on VeVe’s app platform
item.author: Livemint

item.title: Microsoft hits $2 trillion market cap after Windows 11 showcase
item.description: Microsoft had first touched the milestone of $2 trillion market cap on June 22 but dipped below the mark before close.The software maker regained the milestone after the launch of Windows 11
item.author: Livemint

item.title: India Pesticides IPO subscribed over 29 times on final day
item.description: At the end of the last day of the three-day offering, the IPO received bids for more than 560.73 million shares compared with an issue size—excluding the anchor book—of 19.31 million shares.
item.author: Ravindra N. Sonavane

item.title: Oil declines but on track for fifth weekly gain on strong demand
item.description: Brent was down 27 cents, or 0.4%, at $75.29 a barrel at 1028 GMT, but was heading for a 2.4% rise on the week

item.title: Markets end at fresh high led by metal, bank stocks
item.description: RIL shares were down for the fourth straight day as announcements from the company's 44th annual general meeting, held on Thursday, failed to enthuse investors. The stock was the worst hit on Sensex today, down 2.3%
item.author: Ravindra N. Sonavane

item.title: Nifty outlook for next week, key support levels - from Samco Securities
item.description: Investors can closely watch the unlock theme stocks as they could see knee jerk reactions depending on the development in the delta variant.

item.title: Bitcoin reclaims $35,000 level; are bulls back in crypto market?
item.description: Although no one knows what the future holds, the longer Bitcoin traverses inside the $30,000-42,000 range, the weaker the odds of the head &amp; shoulders chart pattern playing out like the bears are hoping
item.author: Abhinav Kaul

item.title: Rupee slips against US dollar, euro
item.description: At the interbank foreign exchange market, the rupee opened at 74.15 per dollar as against its previous close of 74.18
item.author: Livemint

item.title: LIC Housing Finance share price surges as LIC to infuse additional equity capital
item.description: LIC's shareholding in the housing financier post the allotment of shares will go up to 45.24% from over 40.31% currently
item.author: Livemint

item.title: Sensex trades marginally higher, Dow futures up by 88 points
item.description: BSE Sensex is trading up by 147 points, while the NSE Nifty is trading up by 52 points.
item.author: Equitymaster

item.title: NSE adds Aditya Birla Fashion, 3 other stocks in F&O segment from July series
item.description: The latest additions take the total list to 160 stocks that have their derivatives contracts trading on NSE.
item.author: Livemint

item.title: Dolly Khanna buys stake in this textile company. Stock hits upper circuit
item.description: The stock was up 20%, the daily circuit limit, at ₹201.9 per share in early deals on the BSE
item.author: Livemint

item.title: Reliance Industries’ shares fall as cash flow worries rise after AGM
item.description: Reliance Industries Ltd’s shares fell further after the company said it will invest ₹75,000 crore for its new renewable energy business over the next three years. This means capital expenditure (capex) will increase that may dampen the free cash flow (FCF) outlook
item.author: Pallavi Pengonda

item.title: ONGC's Q4 gets a boost from higher crude prices
item.description: Going ahead, with global crude prices at multi-year highs, net realisations are bound to improve. In another positive, the company said its crude oil production has touched last year’s levels
item.author: Ujjval Jauhari

item.title: Gold prices today fall for second day, down about ₹10,000 from record highs
item.description: Gold rates have plunged after Fed's hawkish turn.

item.title: Accenture's revised FY21 revenue guidance bodes well for Infosys, TCS
item.description: Accenture's revenue at $13.3 billion was $300 million above the top end of the guided range. In local currency terms, revenues increased by 16% and 21% on a year-on-year basis
item.author: Harsha Jethmalani

item.title: RIL sheds ₹1.3 tn in market value in 2 days as AGM announcements disappoint
item.description: RIL has pledged to invest ₹75,000 crore in clean energy, becoming the latest oil company to announce a mega push into renewables. It also plans to conclude a long-pending deal to sell a 20% stake in its oil-to-chemicals (O2C) business to Saudi Aramco at about $15 billion by the end of 2021
item.author: Ravindra N. Sonavane

item.title: Ashok Leyland’s Q4 profit beat drives stock up 8%
item.description: During the March quarter, Ashok Leyland’s earnings before interest, tax, depreciation and amortization (Ebitda) margin expanded by around 240 basis points
item.author: Pallavi Pasricha

item.title: China's ban forces some bitcoin miners to flee overseas, others sell out
item.description: China's State Council, or cabinet, vowed to crack down on bitcoin trading and mining in late May, seeking to fend off financial risks after the global bitcoin mania revived Chinese speculative trading in cryptocurrencies .The clampdown comes as China's central bank is testing its own digital currency

item.title: Unlimited vacation on offer for these jobs as companies cannot find candidates
item.description: Binance, the world’s largest crypto exchange, is advertising for some 370 positions globally, according to its LinkedIn recruitment portal

item.title: Sensex closes 226 pts higher, Nifty at 15,856; banks, metals top gainers
item.description: Market closing: Benchmark Indian equity indices closed 0.42% higher on Friday. The Sensex closed at 52,925.04, up 226.04 points, or 0.43%, while Nifty was at 15,856.35, up 65.90 points, or 0.42%. Banking, financials, and metals were top gainers during the day's trade.
item.author: Ishaan Mital

item.title: This Dolly Khanna portfolio stock up 50% in 6 months. Analysts expect more gains
item.description: This Dolly Khanna share has delivered more than 49 per cent return in the last 6 months by rising from ₹126 per share mark to ₹188.05 at NSE
item.author: Asit Manohar
